Package me.gamercoder215.mobchip

Interface EntityBrain

public interface EntityBrain
Represents an Entire Entity Brain

    • setMemory

      <T> void setMemory(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<T> memory, @Nullable T value) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a permanent memory into this entity's brain.
      Parameters:
      memory - Memory to change
      value - Value of new memory, null to remove
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not suitable for this memory

    • setMemory

      <T> void setMemory(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<T> memory, @NotNull T value, long expire) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets a temporary memory into this entity's brain.

      Removing ANY memory should be using setMemory(EntityMemory, Object) with null as the second parameter.

      Parameters:
      memory - Memory to change
      value - Value of new memory
      expire - How many ticks until this memory will be forgotten/removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not suitable for this memory / ticks amount is invalid

    • setMemories

      default void setMemories(@NotNull @NotNull Map<EntityMemory,? extends Object> map)
      Sets multilple permanent memories into this Entity's Brain.
      Parameters:
      map - Map of Memories to their values

    • setMemories

      default void setMemories(@NotNull @NotNull Map<EntityMemory,? extends Object> map, long expire)
      Sets multilple temporary memories into this Entity's Brain.
      Parameters:
      map - Map of Memories to their values
      expire - How many ticks until this memory is forgotten/removed

    • getMemory

      @Nullable <T> T getMemory(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<T> memory)
      Fetch the Memory that is stored in this Entity's Brain.
      Parameters:
      memory - Memory to fetch
      Returns:
      Found value as an object, null if not present

    • getExpiration

      long getExpiration(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<?> memory)
      Get the expiration date of this Memory.
      Parameters:
      memory - Memory to fetch
      Returns:
      Found expiration date, or 0 if not found

    • containsMemory

      boolean containsMemory(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<?> memory)
      Whether or not this Brain contains this memory.
      Parameters:
      memory - Memory to fetch
      Returns:
      true if contains, else false

    • containsAllMemories

      default boolean containsAllMemories(@NotNull @NotNull EntityMemory<?>... memories)
      Whether or not this Brain contains all of these memories.
      Parameters:
      memories - Group of memories to query
      Returns:
      true if they all are contained, else false
